project_metadata.purpose: Definition of done criteria for each epoch to ensure quality gates are met before proceeding

sensor_completeness.metric: Percentage of non-null values per sensor

time_series_gaps.metric: Percentage of time periods with missing data
time_series_gaps.validation_method: Detect timestamp gaps > 2x expected sampling interval

image_quality.validation_method: Try loading each image with PIL/opencv

timestamp_alignment.validation_method: Check timestamp differences between sensor readings and images

file_size_limit.validation_method: os.path.getsize() check on all data files

total_data_footprint.validation_method: Sum of all parquet + image files

memory_usage_during_processing.metric: Peak RAM usage during data generation

data_dictionary.metric: Data dictionary JSON file exists with all columns documented
data_dictionary.validation_method: Verify data_dictionary.json has entry for each column

data_profile_report.validation_method: Check data_profile.html exists and opens in browser

experiment_logged.metric: MLflow experiment created for data processing

dataset_registered.target: All parquet files logged as artifacts
dataset_registered.validation_method: Check MLflow run has artifacts logged

epoch_002_success_criteria.human_review_gate: Not required for Epoch 002 → 003 transition (automated validation only)

failure_event_count.metric: Total number of failure events in dataset

sensor_correlations_valid.validation_method: Manual review of correlation heatmap + domain knowledge

failure_vs_nonfailure_distinguishable.metric: Statistical difference between failure and non-failure distributions
failure_vs_nonfailure_distinguishable.target: t-test or KS-test p-value < 0.05 for key features

defects_identifiable.metric: Visual defects can be identified in images

image_quality_sufficient.target: Mean SSIM (structural similarity) > 0.7 for non-degraded images

remaining_missing_data.metric: Percentage of missing data after cleaning

outlier_handling.target: Outlier handling strategy documented in EDA notebooks
outlier_handling.validation_method: Check notebooks have outlier analysis section

notebooks_executed.metric: All EDA notebooks run without errors
notebooks_executed.validation_method: jupyter nbconvert --execute --to html for each notebook

visualizations_generated.validation_method: Count PNG/HTML files in artifacts directory

data_quality_scorecard.metric: Scorecard HTML generated with pass/fail criteria
data_quality_scorecard.validation_method: Check data_quality_scorecard.html exists with score calculation

epoch_003_success_criteria.human_review_gate: REQUIRED - User must approve EDA findings before proceeding to feature engineering

temporal_features_validated.metric: No future data used in feature calculation
temporal_features_validated.target: 100% of features use only past data
temporal_features_validated.validation_method: Manual code review + unit tests for feature functions

train_test_split_valid.target: Test set only contains data after training set

feature_importance_positive.metric: Percentage of features with non-zero importance

missing_values_in_features.metric: Percentage of missing values in engineered features

visual_features_extracted.metric: CNN embeddings generated for all images
visual_features_extracted.validation_method: Check visual_features.parquet row count matches image count

temporal_alignment_validated.metric: Sensor and image features aligned by timestamp
temporal_alignment_validated.target: 100% of combined rows have valid timestamps

feature_matrix_size.metric: Total size of engineered feature files

sparse_representation.metric: Use sparse matrices for high-dimensional features if applicable
sparse_representation.target: Compress to < 50% of dense representation if >10k features

feature_metadata_complete.target: 100% of features documented with description, data type, source
feature_metadata_complete.validation_method: Verify metadata JSON has entry for each feature column

unit_tests_passing.metric: All feature engineering unit tests pass

epoch_004_success_criteria.human_review_gate: REQUIRED - User must approve feature set before model training

lead_time_accuracy.metric: Mean absolute error for time-to-failure prediction
lead_time_accuracy.validation_method: Mean absolute difference between predicted and actual failure time

cross_validation_consistency.metric: Standard deviation of AUC across CV folds

overfitting_check.validation_method: Compare metrics on train vs test sets

mlflow_registration.metric: Model registered in MLflow Model Registry

model_artifacts_logged.metric: All model files and metadata logged

shap_values_computed.target: SHAP explainer object saved with model

feature_importance_logged.metric: Feature importance values logged to MLflow
feature_importance_logged.validation_method: Check MLflow run has feature_importance metrics

model_utils_extracted.validation_method: File exists and passes unit tests

industry_adapters_created.target: industry_adapters.py with config for manufacturing, military, oil_gas, logistics
industry_adapters_created.validation_method: Verify adapter file has configurations for all 4 industries

epoch_005_success_criteria.human_review_gate: Not required for Epoch 005 → 006 transition (automated validation only)

precision_at_95_recall.metric: Precision when recall is set to 95%
precision_at_95_recall.validation_method: Adjust threshold to achieve 95% recall, measure precision

early_detection_rate.metric: Percentage of failures detected ≥7 days in advance

edge_case_robustness.metric: Percentage of edge case tests passed
edge_case_robustness.validation_method: Count passed edge case tests / total edge case tests

latency_p95.metric: 95th percentile inference latency for batch predictions

safety_compliance.validation_method: Manual review of safety test cases

cross_equipment_transfer.metric: Performance retention when tested on different equipment types
cross_equipment_transfer.validation_method: Test on held-out equipment types, compare AUC

missing_data_handling.validation_method: Randomly drop 20% of sensors, measure AUC change

explainability_quality.metric: Percentage of high-risk predictions with clear explanations
explainability_quality.validation_method: Manual review of SHAP explanations for top 100 high-risk predictions

pass.condition: All mandatory criteria met AND ≤ 2 warning criteria failed
pass.action: Promote model to Staging, proceed to Epoch 007

conditional_pass.condition: All mandatory criteria met AND 3-4 warning criteria failed
conditional_pass.action: Promote to Staging with enhanced monitoring, document known limitations

fail.condition: Any mandatory criterion failed OR > 4 warning criteria failed
fail.action: Return to Epoch 005 for model improvements

comprehensive_test_report.target: File generated with all test results
comprehensive_test_report.validation_method: File exists and contains sections for all test categories

compliance_report.target: PDF with safety, audit trail, explainability validation
compliance_report.validation_method: PDF file exists and is valid

epoch_006_success_criteria.human_review_gate: REQUIRED - User must approve test results and deployment decision

model_api_latency.metric: 95th percentile latency for Model API predictions
model_api_latency.validation_method: Load testing with 1000 requests, measure p95

streamlit_app_load_time.metric: Time to interactive for Streamlit app

alert_generation_latency.metric: End-to-end time from prediction to alert display
alert_generation_latency.validation_method: Time from API call to UI update

pdf_generation_time.metric: Time to generate insights PDF via LLM
pdf_generation_time.validation_method: Time LLM API call + PDF rendering

load_test_success.metric: Zero critical errors during 100-user load test
load_test_success.validation_method: locust or similar load testing tool

executive_overview_tab.metric: Heat charts display equipment health for fleet
executive_overview_tab.validation_method: Manual UI testing with sample data

operations_tab.target: Alerts sorted by failure probability, <60s refresh
operations_tab.validation_method: Manual UI testing with live data stream

insights_tab.target: PDF includes root cause analysis, maintenance recommendations, cost-benefit

drift_detection_active.target: Dashboard displays prediction drift, feature drift, KS-test p-values

automated_alerts_configured.metric: Email/Slack alerts trigger on drift detection
automated_alerts_configured.target: Alert sent when >30% features drift or prediction distribution changes

api_documentation.target: OpenAPI spec or equivalent with all endpoints documented
api_documentation.validation_method: Verify API docs accessible at /docs endpoint

deployment_guide.target: Guide includes environment setup, model deployment, app deployment

rollback_plan.target: Can rollback to previous model version in < 5 minutes
rollback_plan.validation_method: Test rollback procedure in staging environment

deployment_utils_extracted.target: deployment_utils.py and monitoring_utils.py exist with unit tests

epoch_007_success_criteria.human_review_gate: REQUIRED - User must approve deployed application before production release

all_agent_reports_created.validation_method: Count markdown files in lessons_learned/ directory

report_quality.metric: Each report includes successes, challenges, recommendations

actual_vs_estimated_analysis.target: JSON has estimated and actual time/resources for Epochs 002-007

resource_utilization_analysis.validation_method: Verify JSON has compute, storage, cost sections

cost_breakdown.target: Includes compute, LLM API, storage, human effort

reusable_playbook_created.target: Playbook includes timeline, tech stack, resource requirements, pitfalls

industry_adaptation_guidance.metric: Playbook includes guidance for adapting to other industries
industry_adaptation_guidance.target: Section on military, oil_gas, logistics adaptations

project_timeline_visualization.metric: project_timeline.html shows visual timeline of all epochs
project_timeline_visualization.target: Interactive HTML with checkpoints, reviews, blockers
project_timeline_visualization.validation_method: File exists and renders in browser

recommendations_document.target: Includes process improvements, technical improvements, resource optimization
recommendations_document.validation_method: File exists with minimum 3 recommendation categories

epoch_008_success_criteria.human_review_gate: OPTIONAL - User may review retrospective findings for future projects

cost_reduction_target.metric: Estimated maintenance cost reduction vs reactive approach

model_accuracy_deployment.validation_method: MLflow logged metric from production model

reusable_code_percentage.metric: Percentage of code extracted to src/ for reusability
reusable_code_percentage.validation_method: Lines of code in src/ vs total code written

multi_industry_transferability.metric: Model can be adapted to new industry with <20% data
multi_industry_transferability.validation_method: Few-shot learning test on held-out industry

zero_resource_limit_violations.validation_method: Review all checkpoints and logs for resource violations

all_quality_gates_passed.metric: All epoch handoff quality gates passed

human_reviews_completed.metric: All required human review gates completed

timeline_variance.validation_method: Compare actual completion date to plan
